title: Mending a Malone
description: Jaret Malone has a problem . . .A five-foot-two curvy, crazy problem. One who doesnâ€™t seem to take no for an answer.After his last relationship ended disastrously, he has had no interest in getting involved with someone else.Especially not some insane woman who seems to think that her grandmother left him to her in her will.Nobody tells a Malone what to do . . .
author: Laylah Roberts
